channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Nikolai Aleksandrovich Kozyrev
item.description: Nikolai Alexandrovich Kozyrev (Russian: Никола́й Алекса́ндрович Ко́зырев; 2 September 1908 – 27 February 1983) was a Soviet Russian astronomer and astrophysicist.
